Description: Two joining fragments of floor of Attic black-glazed stamped pottery open vessel (bowl?). Glazed save for groove at join of foot and wall on outside. Four linked palmettes preserved on floor. Incised inscription. Joined from two fragments.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 583)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1808)
